DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to compare the performance of two contact lenses for contact lens wearers with astigmatism.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Two Daily Disposable Contact Lenses for Wearers With Astigmatism
DOC.criteria: Currently wearing soft contact lenses with astigmatism correction Other protocol inclusion criteria may apply Eye injury or surgery within twelve weeks prior to enrollment Currently enrolled in an ophthalmic clinical trial Strabismus Any use of medications for which contact lens wear could be contraindicated as determined by the investigator Other protocol exclusion criteria may apply
